name: Robert Amaro
text: I've used these folks twice now.  Two years ago, directly after purchasing a house that had sat dormant for 3+ years, the septic system decided to act up.  The Tice's came out late at night and found out that my tank was 100% overgrown with tree roots (reminded me of the scene in the Creep Show episode with the meteor).  They pumped down the tank immediately so that we could shower, and within a week they had come out and completely cleaned out the root system (chainsaw work INSIDE my tanks).  They did an amazing amount of work for a great price.  Yesterday, the old system started acting up again.  They came out first thing this morning so we could shower for work.  As we had suspected 2 years ago, the roots had gotten into the drain system as well. Absolutely amazing folks! Will always use them.

resp.text: Thank you Mr Amaro. See you soon.

name: James McElroy
text: Charged to much and did not finish pumping tank showed up nearly full tank complained about how much it cost him to empty truck ,left yard trashy with gloves and cardboard paper, said they would come back and finish pumping.      All they did was just pump water 1/3 of tank out in tank never came back would not recommend con artist. Tank was still 2/3 full call (Newell tank service they pumped out rest for a lot less than these would and was very professional)

resp.text: As I recall and I remember this night very well. We came out to your house and you had only dug up one side of your tank (1 lid) and you had another lid broken. We pumped all we could out bc we couldnt get to the other side that was not uncovered. We flushed out your field lines going back 125 ft bc they were stopped up and we were trying to save the lines for you bc you didnt have the $$ to upgrade your tank. He stayed out there with his HEAD down in your tank trying to help you out. Again, bc you didnt have the $ to upgrade he was going to go as far as bring you a concrete lid of ours to put on your tank in place of your broken lid. You talked to him the next day and he told you that he would come back out there and finish pumping the tank if you got it all uncovered and bring you another concrete lid with no charge. So that is why your tank did not get fully pumped out that night at 11pm.

name: wanda mccombs
text: I definitely would not recommended Jim Rice or his daughter they have no jefferson County license will take your money and leave with out finishing they charged 1248.00 to just cleaned out septic tank and then started telling me I need to upgrade said I had no field lines which was grap said he needed 4000.00 up front total price 6800.00 well came 2 times at night digging my yard in meantime messing my yard up with bobcat well 23 of January got a code violation from Leeds had no permit well he took the bobcat and left leaving my holes a mess . legal aid Merkei Wright has done nothing they did a invoice stated what they have done which was out right lie charged 2 times stated cleaned and pumped tank . there price is so jacked up too people do not use them

resp.text: Lets be clear Ms McCombs. Jim worked under your house for 6.5 hours to unstop the pipes under your house and he laid in YOUR raw sewage to unstop your pipes. We have an Alabama State license and County License. We sent you a check back to refund your money bc of all the problems you have caused us. There was nothing we could do at the time bc the WHOLE COUNTRY was shut down during COVID-19 pandemic. You were not patient with us and would not give the country time to get back to normal. BUT Jim was all great and wonderful when he came out to YOUR HOUSE in the middle of the night to unstop your house so you could go to the bathroom.. HE WAS ALL GREAT AND WONDERFUL THEN.

name: Emery Piper
text: This company is very untruthful. Please make sure you have an understanding about the price before they come. They seem to twist prices around where you think your getting one price but you get another. They may tell you no service fee or no disposal fee. Then charge you.  There work is good. But be careful you may paydouble what you expect.

name: Wendi Phillips Lawley
text: Called them on Tuesday and he came out that evening so I could expedite my closing on my house. Professional and efficient, did a wonderful job. I would definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Wendi. We greatly appreciate you.

name: Wallace Ragsdale
text: They didn't leave until my system was working and fixed.  Showed up same day,  on time.  Thank y'all for great service!  Will choose again!

resp.text: Thank you so much. We greatly appreciate your business.

name: Wanda Mcombs
text: This company  is a RIP off, charge me 1248.00 to clean septic tank  then starting  claiming  I need an upgrade  and that I had no field lines  well I have live here 24 years , gave me a price of over 6,000.00 said he needed 4,000.00 up front well game over 2 times at night  digging  up yard  on 23 of January  got  a code violation  he didn't  have a permit  that night he pulled out  left my yard  a mess both front and back  with major holes,  can't  get him back come to find out  no Jefferson county license  either should  not even started  it , biggest  problem  and crook

name: Brandy Stalls
text: These guys where at our house within 3 hours of calling, they even beat me there from work! They made sure the job was complete and all was in working order before leaving. (They were personal and entertaining as well) AMAZING service, GREAT people!

resp.text:
Thank you Brandy for the kind words. We strive for 100% customer satisfaction, and we are very happy when we achieve it.
Thanks again, Phaydra

name: Andrew Wolff
text: Friendly staff and easy lot.

name: Vic W.
text: Very quick, pulled right into the bay.   Very courteous

name: Stephen Nixon
text: Good good. Good good.    Just. Right

name: MockOverdrive
text: One of the best Quala washes I've been to, friendly staff, clean bathrooms, and they do a great job cleaning tanks thoroughly.

name: john condos
text: Very nice and friendly people good job doing the tank cleaning

name: David Barber
text: Sold out to qualawash and it took them 2 hours to get to me just to wash my hoses out and they charge entirely to much

name: Dalton Kemp
text:
Very nice people. Great facility. They have over night parking for customers who need a tank wash.
They also have a nice drivers lounge with tv.

name: Michael Cowart
text: Fast service. Great washout.

name: Kymberly Selvage
text: Very big and very nice owner.he had us some ribs, mashed potatoes,fried onion rings.i enjoyed my visit

name: Ed Roberts
text: Very nice, clean. Drivers lounge, shower, coffee and quite a few places will deliver lunch and dinner. Never had a problem here. Fast service and Good people.

name: Charlene Xylona
text: Very nice driver's lounge. Ladies room is clean with a shower.  The ladies at the desk are nice and personable yet precessional. The yard however is muddy with potholes but overall experience is pleasant.

name: Claude Raymond
text: Great place ! Good people they do a  good job. Nice driver waiting room

name: Francine Janson
text:
Such kind people!
Very rare these days!
Receptionist is just so sweet.

name: Александр Венгерский
text: 180 washout after potatoes

name: Booker Collins
text: Couldn't get washed here cause they can only take so much heel but the people were cool for that four stars

name: Aaron Smith
text: Got here late as they were closing the wash bays and he still let me come in for a wash, nice people they did not have to do that. Glad there are still some kind folks out there

name: Melvin Glenn
text: Very good

name: Jeffrey “Jazzy Jeff” Smith
text: Slow service.

name: Paul Conrad
text: Friendly and helpful staff as well as the owner

name: Angela enola (2feathers)
text: Not fast. Slow service. Unsanitary for box trailers. No deodorizer or sanitizer offer. $40 for running water in a reefer

name: Robert Burns
text: Mike is super awesome and helpful

name: Henry Etheredge
text: Tank wash

name: michael mcclain
text: Not a good experience hear . Frozen pips . 2 days later bowlers were out . Waiting 6 plus hours

name: Rich OC
text: It's a tank wash.

name: Dennis Holliday
text: Great people,  very fast

name: Jimmie Thomas
text: Parking lot is in bad shape

name: Corey Andrews
text: Fast & efficient

name: McKay Pearce
text: Great staff! Friendly folks!
